attributes.action: help those who help the disabled
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: help carers like me who have £50 above the living allowance and therefore get no financial help because I worked and get hospital pension.  I have given up my life to care for my 80 yr old husband, I have no life other than caring for him.  Why doesn't the government help poeple like me who have worked, brought up four children.  If hadn't done so I would be eligable for any no of benefits - somewhat unfair by anyone's standards
